Text: You have done great thing! Took the trouble to collect, rip in great quality, and share such an excellent film. Many many thanks from Bangladesh.

Great quality. The subs are a bit, unpolished if you get what I mean.

But let's try to keep this torrent alive. It's the only video telling about nuclear bombing and its effects.

Darn, we should have nuclear bombings every day! Especially in eastern europe! The slaveworkers would be happy to finally die and see their ensalvers rot in hell.
